content.title: Tummy Tuck Thailand - Bangkok and Samui
h2: WOULD YOU LIKE TO GET SURGEON FEEDBACK?
paragraphs: The way that you feel about yourself is very important as well as the way others view you. So for this reason, the majority of people take great pains to make sure that they look their best, in order, to keep up their appearance. However, there are times that that having a balanced diet and exercising doesn’t cut it, especially if you’re trying to eliminate the tummy and create a flat stomach, therefore, they may opt to have tummy tuck Thailand.

A tummy tuck, also known as an abdominoplasty, is a surgery that flattens the stomach by the removal of extra fat and skin surrounding the stomach as well as tightening the abdominal muscles. If you suffer from loose skin caused by extreme weight loss or muscles that have become weak because of pregnancy then having a tummy tuck will be able to improve this problem area. This procedure can dramatically improve the look of your abdomen.

So you’re a good candidate for tummy tuck Thailandif you have large fat deposits or lose and sagging skin surrounding the stomach area. Not only that, it’s vital that you have a realistic and clear expectation of what you wish to accomplish. You should keep in mind, however, that if you’re planning to lose weight or get pregnant then you should wait to undergo the surgery. It’s also noteworthy, that the fat deposits are limited to the area underneath the belly button so you may also want to consider a mini tummy tuck as well.

You should keep in mind that no matter how cautious your surgeon is while performing the surgery, there are always risk, however, the rate of complications occurring are minimal. The surgeons that conduct theses surgeries are experienced and highly trained. So you can consider it a safe move to have a tummy tuck in Thailand. In addition, to being safe going to Thailand for a tummy tuck you can also save up to 70% when compared to having the surgery done in North America, Europe and Australia.

When you have tummy tuck Thailandyou should expect to stay for 8-10 days. You’ll be required to have a 3 night stay in the hospital, and seven days after the surgery you’ll have a follow up. So this leaves you time to have sort of a mini vacation since you have the choice to recover at a beach resort. This recovery time in a beautiful place will optimize your healing and you’ll be back to yourself in no time fully relaxed.

If you have realistic expectations of tummy tuck Thailandand want to have a flatter stomach that you can be proud of then you should consider having this procedure done. You can come to Thailand for the procedure where you’ll have the best surgery and care by experienced surgeons, in addition, you can relax in a beautiful country and learn about a new culture and go home refreshed and renewed.

Fill out the Medical Questionnaire (next page) to help our plastic surgeon determine if you are medically qualified for your surgery. Surgeon will carefully review your case and prepare an initial evaluation, including a price quote for procedure(s).
Tell us what you are looking for and we will send you all the information…

( click to enlarge ) Nights in Hospital: 2-4 Duration of operation is about 4-6 hours and you need to stay in Thailand for at least 9 days.
